hj_timesheets.timesheet_project_name: Readable project name displayed in portal and approvals.
hj_timesheets.timesheet_payment_deal_id: Well/AFE identifier used downstream for billing.
hj_timesheets.timesheet_sales_deal_id: Sales deal ID for revenue alignment.
hj_timesheets.timesheet_consultant_email: Consultant email stored on the line item.
hj_timesheets.timesheet_role: Role/position used for approvals and invoicing.
hj_timesheets.timesheet_well: Well name captured from consultant configuration.

hj_consultants.hj_project_id: Project ID used to match consultant records to submissions.
hj_consultants.consultant_id: Contact ID used for association lookup.
hj_consultants.sales_deal_id: Sales deal record referenced in approvals.
hj_consultants.well: Well name associated with the consultant/service.

contact.cg_project_id: Selected project ID staged for WF-11.
contact.cg_start_dates_array: Start dates for each line item.
contact.cg_end_dates_array: End dates for each line item.
contact.cg_ordinal_numbers: Sequence numbers used to detect duplicates.
contact.quote_consultant_id: Billing terms identifier reused in WF-11.
contact.quote_consultant_name: Billing type string reused in WF-11.
contact.submitted_as_timesheet_contact: Flag indicating consultant vs delegate submission.
contact.approval_timesheet_ids_array: Timesheet IDs staged for approval handoff.
contact.response_approval_timesheet_ids_array: IDs populated by approval response workflows.
